data: Paolo Grigolini, Ph.D Paolo Grigolini, Ph.D Professor (940) 565-3294 grigo@unt.edu GAB 525A Ph.D (University of Pisa (Italy), 1969) Biophysics, Nonlinear Dynamics & Complex Systems. Science of complexity; joint action of order & randomness as a source of long-range correlation; self-organization in physics, biology, & material science; from dynamics to thermodynamics & from quantum to classical physics:anomalous vs the ordinary statistical mechanical perspective. Research interest: Biophysics, Nonlinear Dynamics and Complex Systems. Science of complexity; joint action of order and randomness as a source of long-range correlation; self-organization in physics, biology, and material science; from dynamics to thermodynamics and from quantum to classical physics: the anomalous versus the ordinary statistical mechanical perspective.
